ActorTalk: All your information has been verified. Everything's in order. You're now cleared to participate in the event.
Your electronic invitation has been sent to your terminal. Please use it to enter. We hope you enjoy the experience.
Thank you. The invitation mentioned a location at the end without providing any details. May I ask what it means...?
That location is for a hidden challenge in the event. If you complete it, there's an extra reward waiting for you.
A reward... Commandant, should we give it to Lee as a gift?
Hah. So this is how [PlayerName] spends a vacation? Lounging around in places like this? How carefree of you.
Kuroro Coffee... You've actually reminded me. It's a nice place when you need a break from the noise.
Didn't you see the crowd swarming the front of Kowloong Restaurant when you arrived? That was all thanks to two of my team's "geniuses."
...You mean Noctis and No. 21?
Yeah. They wouldn't shut up about the renovations and insisted on coming out here. Along the way, they started arguing over whether mango or strawberry ice cream is better.
The fight got out of hand, and they ended up knocking over all the display dishes in front of the restaurant.
Kowloong Restaurant is demanding full compensation. On top of that, they're making the two of them wash dishes all day to make up for the emotional damage.
They were still bickering while scrubbing plates, so I just left. Let them learn the hard way. I'll pick them up after closing.
I see... Kuroro Coffee closes around the same time as Kowloong Restaurant. It really is the perfect place to wait and relax.
Since it's on my way, I might as well. But don't count on me for whatever noisy activities they've planned. I'm not interested in that.
Let's go. I just need a quiet spot to pass the time.
Sounds good.
I'm all for it.
We're here for an event at Kuroro Coffee.
Something bothering you?
"A break from the noise"?
So... what happened to them?
...Sounds like a mess.
Would you like to come with us, Vera?
